name: Custom Engraved Beer Mug YourName The Man The Myth The Legend.
description:
Custom Engraved Glass YourName The Man The Myth The Legend.
Simple and beautiful clear 10.5 oz glass is engraved engraved with Your Name above the words the man the myth the legend.

Also available in 11 oz mug or 20 oz tall mug.

Specify glass style required when ordering glass.

Specify Name required when ordering glass.

Clear glass style 10.5 oz. measures approximately 3.7/8" tall. Top rim of glass is approximately 3.5" dia.

Order this great custom glass for the legend in your life.

Art engraved by making a custom stencil and sand engraving design into glass. Makes a beautiful permanent design in the glass.

Thanks for looking.
Ron

name: Keep Calm and Carry On Engraved Tall Glass Mug
description:
Keep Calm and Carry On Engraved Tall Glass Mug

DESCRIPTION
Engraved glass mug with original art created by me. This glass 20oz mug measures about 7" tall and 3-1/2" in diameter.

Simple and beautiful design. Each glass is hand engraved using the sandblast process using a custom made stencil applied to the glass. Due to the hand made process each glass may be slightly different.

OUR METHOD OF ENGRAVING:
This is a sandblasted product
It will not fade, wash or peel off as with laminated products
It is deeply sandblasted into the glass - you can feel the depth in the glass

PAYMENTS:
Payments by PayPal or U.S. Postal Money Order.
Remember, e-checks through PayPal takes 3-5 days to clear
You have 3 days to cancel or change the information on you order (72 hours).
Once processing has started there are no refunds or exchanges as we cannot resell personalized items.

SHIPPING:
Shipment will be made between 3 to 10 business (M-F) days after payment is cleared.
Include description with your payment.
If you need it sooner, let me know thru convo.
Will be shipped United States Postal Services Priority Mail including Delivery Confirmation.
We ship using bubble wrap, styrofoam peanuts, double boxing, and/or tissue.

TERMS of SALE:
Please make sure all your information is correct, double check spelling, punctuation, dates, and/or wording.
We do not accept returns or refunds on engraved items unless we made the error.

Thank You - Ron

name: Personalized Groomsman Beer Mug Custom Engraved
description:
Personalized Groomsman Beer Mug Custom Engraved

DESCRIPTION Large 20 oz beer mug. 24 oz when filled to the rim, Beer Mug, Clear Glass Great For Bridesmaids, Groomsmen, Wedding, or Gift Engraved glass with your custom monogram or text.

Discounts available for multiple orders of same glass.
I can also use your monogram supplied by you to etch on the glass. Unless specified otherwise the font shown is the font used for the monogram.

Simple and beautiful design. Each glass is engraved using the highest quality engraving methods available. Each glass is personally engraved by me.

Engraving is permanent etching in the glass and will not rub off or wear out. All glasses are dishwasher safe.

PAYMENTS:
Mail Orders Accepted.
Remember, e-checks through PayPal takes 3-5 days to clear
You have 3 days to cancel or change the information on you order (72 hours).
Once processing has started there are no refunds or exchanges as we cannot resell personalized items.
